caption: Relating to business entities.
summary: This bill amends the Business Organizations Code to modify corporate governance rules. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects all corporations including foreign-owned ones by: 1) Requiring internal entity claims to be brought only in Texas courts 2) Allowing corporations to require jury trial waivers 3) Setting new requirements for derivative lawsuits 4) Establishing presumptions about director/officer conduct.
translation: 该法案修改了商业组织法典中的公司治理规则。虽然没有特别针对中国移民，但它通过以下方式影响所有公司（包括外资公司）：1）要求内部实体诉讼只能在德克萨斯州法院提起 2）允许公司要求放弃陪审团审判 3）对衍生诉讼设定新要求 4）确立关于董事/高管行为的推定规则。
committees:
1. Business Commerce Committee
2. State Affairs Committee
3. Judiciary Committee
